message: I have a great product for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can find a better price. I am willing to pay $120 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $135.
Thank you for your flexibility. I think we can work something out. I am willing to pay $125 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $140. I think it's a fair price for a great product.
